Permitting. Incentives. Tax Credits.
1Climate’s AI enabled platform covers all your clean energy regulatory needs.
How It Works
The 1Climate platform uses advanced AI tools to aggregate and synthesize the relevant regulatory and permitting data for your project.
Use 1Climate’s AI to automate your project workflows and generate documents and filings.
Monetize clean energy tax credits more easily by using 1Climate’s regulatory compliance tools.
Empowering Clean Energy Developers with AI Solutions
Unlock the full potential of your clean energy projects with our cutting-edge AI solutions. We understand the value of your time and resources, which is why our platform is designed to streamline processes, optimize decision-making, and ensure compliance.
Meet our Team
Kevin Diau
Kevin is a Stanford and Harvard Kennedy School grad with a decade of clean energy experience in the US and Africa. While at Geli, he built solar+storage software tools and later scaled up off-grid solar solutions at ENGIE Energy Access and the World Bank Group.
Join the waitlist
Send us a message and we will respond you as soon as possible

Terms & Conditions – 1Climate
Without prior approval and written permission, you may not create frames around our Webpages that alter in any way the visual presentation or appearance of our Website.
We shall not be hold responsible for any content that appears on your Website. You agree to protect and defend us against all claims that is rising on your Website. No link(s) should appear on any Website that may be interpreted as libelous, obscene or criminal, or which infringes, otherwise violates, or advocates the infringement or other violation of, any third party rights.
We reserve the right to request that you remove all links or any particular link to our Website. You approve to immediately remove all links to our Website upon request. We also reserve the right to amen these terms and conditions and it’s linking policy at any time. By continuously linking to our Website, you agree to be bound to and follow these linking terms and conditions.

Privacy Policy – 1Climate
1. Definitions
Welcome to www.1climate.app (the “Website”), operated by 1Climate, Inc. (“1Climate,” “we,” “us,” or “our”). This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, protect, and handle information provided by our users (“you” or “your”) through the “Contact Us” form on our Website.
2. Use of Information
The information you share through the “Contact Us” form is used in the following ways:
To personalize your experience and allow us to deliver the type of content and service offerings in which you are most interested.
To improve our Website in order to better serve you.
To allow us to better respond to your customer service requests.
3. Protection of Information
We are committed to the protection of your information. Your personal information is stored in secure networks and is only accessible by a limited number of persons who have special access rights to such systems and are required to keep the information confidential.
4. Sharing of Information
We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your Personally Identifiable Information to outside parties. This does not include website hosting partners and other parties who assist us in operating our Website, conducting our business, or serving our users, so long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential.
5. Data Retention
We will retain the personal information provided through the “Contact Us” form for as long as it is necessary to fulfill the purpose for which it was collected, to provide our services, to deal with possible legal claims, and for backup and recovery purposes.
6. Your Consent
By using our Website and submitting your information through the “Contact Us” form, you consent to our Privacy Policy.
7. Contacting Us
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, the practices of this site, or your dealings with this Website, please contact us through the “Contact Us” form or at the details provided on our Website.
